platforms.name: Lovable

Support for 30+ programming languages and 20+ IDEs (VS Code, JetBrains, etc.)

platforms.name: GitHub Copilot
platforms.description: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered pair programmer that provides real-time code suggestions and autocompletion directly within integrated development environments (IDEs). Its unique value lies in its deep integration with the developer's current file and project context, trained on billions of lines of public code, enabling it to suggest not just syntax but logical code blocks and common patterns.

Whole function or method generation from natural language comments

Interactive code behavior explanation and analysis within the IDE
Automatic detection of edge cases and suggestion of test scenarios
